mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: We believe everyone deserves the chance to learn to read. Our platform provides free, accessible literacy education in South African languages and beyond.

crisis.title: The Literacy Crisis
crisis.text: South Africa faces one of the worst literacy rates among comparable countries. Studies show that 78% of Grade 4 learners cannot read for meaning. This means they can sound out words but do not understand what they read.

causes.title: Why This Happens
causes.poverty: Poverty limits access to books and learning materials
causes.resources: Schools lack textbooks and trained teachers
causes.language: Children often learn in a second language

solution.title: How We Help
solution.text: Our platform uses proven techniques to help people learn to read at any age.

footer.mission: Helping South Africans and all Africans learn to read, one word at a time.
footer.contactText: Have questions or want to help? Reach out to us.
